channel.title: upgrade on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in upgrade on Barefoot Rob

item.title: upgrading server
item.description: 06:34 Sunday 17 May 2015 JST I woke up early to upgrade the server: sudo do-release-upgrade “Installing the upgrade can take several hours….” I read that and noped out! I better let the client know first! sudo apt-get upgrade for now.
